name: Explosion (Xav333)
description:
EXPLOSION

Explode your way through endless waves of enemies and chain attacks.  Playing as a circle with the ability to explode through everything, you fight an endless amount of enemies. Killing multiple enemies during the same attack increases your combo. My highscore is 399.  Can you beat it?

I coded this game in JavaScript using the HTML5 canvas. It is recommended you run this project on chrome, as it has not been tested in any other browsers yet. The game works with a keyboard and most controllers, but it is recommended you use a Dualshock 4 controller.
